name: Ram War Dating Simulator
description:
This is a dating simulator based on the world and characters from a friend's indie game called Ram War, a multiplayer class-based FPS. Currently, the game this project is based on it is still in the early stages of development but several modes and weapons have been created so that the game is playable. The cast is filled with personified objects and weapons from the game. As of right now, most of the used assets are placeholders but the actual art and music are being created. Versions for both Windows and Mac are available in the download.

If you are interested in watching streams containing both gameplay and coding development of the game the check out his twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/2000bmc
